metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: co
plugins.description: v7.5.0 - Multi-tentacled orchestrator using Double Diamond methodology. Improved UX! 60% shorter command names (/co: instead of /claude-octopus:), categorized commands (sys-, flow-, skill-), 15 shortcuts! Run /co:setup for guided setup.

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: DEPRECATED: Use 'co' instead. Legacy namespace for backward compatibility. v7.5.0 - All commands still work with /claude-octopus: prefix, but /co: is recommended.
